title: If Fiora's Vitals are supposed to indicate her dueling skill...
body:
Then why do they spawn based on RNG?

Seriously, a Fiora mirror match is decided basically entirely by RNG. This is not fun.

replies.body: Actually you're kind of on to something, Fiora does a load of damage when she procs her vitals. Maybe when she is facing her opponent the vital should be behind them at all times and rotate when Fiora changes direction in view of the opponent.
crits in general are RNG, doesnt jsut apply to trynd, the fact that an underfarmed ADC can beat a fed one based entirly on that 40% crit chance jsut makes crits cancerous.
